John.name: John
John.bio: John is a live coding enthusiast who specializes in generative art and algorithmic music. He frequently performs at coding events worldwide.

Alice.name: Alice
Alice.bio: Alice is a creative coder who combines her love for technology and art to produce stunning live coding performances. She also mentors aspiring coders.

Robert.name: Robert
Robert.bio: Robert is an experienced live coder known for his innovative approach to creating real-time music and visuals. He enjoys experimenting with new tools and techniques.
